Title: Stay tuned
Text:
I want to learn so many instruments. I want to understand every musical sound.

Ms. Searle told me that many conductors are well-practiced in a range of instruments. I want to be like that too.

If I could make an orchestra reproduce the perfect melody in my mind, surely that would be my greatest joy.

Will that day ever come when I can precisely identify and control the sound of each instrument to transform every note into a passionate cry?

Ms. Searle also said there are times when I should give up the urge for control and give the orchestra space to breathe and create.

But if I do that, how will I be sure that the music at my command is flawless?
